response.overview: The "Celebrity Nude Revue, Easy 80's Volume 2" DVD is a rare find featuring Traci Lords and Kim Basinger in a documentary-style movie that showcases their nude performances. This DVD format is region-free, making it compatible for worldwide viewing. With a rating of NR, this film falls under the documentary genre, providing a unique and intimate look at the celebrity figures within the easy 80's era. Perfect for collectors and fans of classic 80's entertainment, this DVD offers a glimpse into the world of nude performances from some of Hollywood's most iconic figures.
response.title: Celebrity Nude Revue: Easy 80's Volume 2
